trans-unit.source: Provides detailed information about a <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona información detallada sobre un <see langword="TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instances are obtained from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> las instancias se obtienen de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The information in <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> is obtained by parsing the attributes decorating speech text in the Synthesize Speech Markup Language (SSML) used as an input to a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: La información de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> se obtiene mediante el análisis de los atributos de decoración de texto en el sintetizar voz marcado Language (SSML) usado como entrada para un motor de síntesis de voz.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object can exist for any synthesizer action request as specified by its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> puede existir para cualquier solicitud de acción de sintetizador según lo especificado por su <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: However, the meaning of its members may change for different actions.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, puede cambiar el significado de sus miembros para distintas acciones.

trans-unit.source: For more information on synthesize actions, see <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> for more information about specifying synthesizer actions.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre las acciones de sintetizar, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> para obtener más información acerca de cómo especificar acciones de sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: Specification and control of the quality of the spoken output is largely handled through the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>
trans-unit.target: Especificación y el control de la calidad de la salida de voz en gran medida se controla mediante la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>, y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Phonetic, language, and linguist structure information is available through <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Información de estructura fonético, idioma y lingüista está disponible a través de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>, y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> enumeration that specifies a speech synthesis action.
trans-unit.target: Un miembro de la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> que especifica una acción de la síntesis de voz.

trans-unit.source: The id of the language being used.
trans-unit.target: Identificador del idioma utilizado.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the XML <c>xml:lang</c> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde al atributo <c>xml:lang</c>.

trans-unit.source: The emphasis to be applied to speech output or pauses.
trans-unit.target: El énfasis que se aplicará a la salida o a las pausas de voz.

trans-unit.source: The time allotted to speak the text of the <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: El tiempo asignado para leer en voz alta el texto de <see langword="TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: A member of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> class, indicating the type of text of the <see langword="TextFragment" /> and the level of detail required for accurate rendering of the contained text.
trans-unit.target: Un miembro de la clase <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" />, que indica el tipo de texto de <see langword="TextFragment" /> y el nivel de detalle necesario para la representación precisa del texto contenido.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the <c><say-as></c> XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corresponde a la etiqueta XML <c><say-as></c> en la especificación de SSML.

trans-unit.source: The argument may be <see langword="null." />
trans-unit.target: El argumento puede ser <see langword="null." />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> object indicating characteristics of the speech output such as pitch, speaking rate and volume.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> que indica características de salida de voz como el timbre, la velocidad de habla y el volumen.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the <c><prosody></c> XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corresponde a la etiqueta XML <c><prosody></c> en la especificación de SSML.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see langword="char" /> objects providing the phonetic pronunciation for text contained in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />, using the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) specification.
trans-unit.target: Una matriz de objetos <see langword="char" /> que proporcionan la pronunciación fonética del texto contenido en <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />, mediante la especificación del Alfabeto fonético internacional (IPA).

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the <c><phoneme></c> XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde a la etiqueta XML <c><phoneme></c> en la especificación de SSML.

trans-unit.source: This argument may be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Este argumento puede ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of <see langword="FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de <see langword="FragmentState" />.

trans-unit.source: Typically, applications do not directly construct <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objects.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, las aplicaciones no crear directamente <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> instances are created by applications using the members of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> name space.
trans-unit.target: En su lugar, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> se crean instancias de las aplicaciones que utilizan los miembros de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis> espacio de nombres.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value specified by the `action` argument is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>, the value supplied by the `emphasis` argument is either:
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valor especificado por el `action` argumento es <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>, el valor proporcionado por el `emphasis` argumento sea:

trans-unit.source: If positive, the time in millisecond to pause
trans-unit.target: Si es positivo, el tiempo en milisegundos para poner en pausa

trans-unit.source: If negative a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> enumeration
trans-unit.target: Si un negativo de un miembro de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak> (enumeración)

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value specified by the `action` argument is not <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>`emphasis` argument must be of type <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valor especificado por el `action` el argumento no es <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence> `emphasis` argumento debe ser de tipo <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `duration` argument and The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Duration%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> object specified by the `prosody` argument differ, the value on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> object is used.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor de la `duration` argumento y el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Duration%2A> propiedad o el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> objeto especificado por el `prosody` argumento son diferentes, el valor en el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> se utiliza el objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the requested speech synthesizer action.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve la acción de sintetizador de voz solicitada.

trans-unit.source: A member of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> indicating the speech synthesis action requested by SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Un miembro de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction" /> que indica la acción de síntesis de voz solicitada por la entrada de SSML.

trans-unit.source: Returns the desired time for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el tiempo deseado para presentar un <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see langword="int" /> containing a value in millisecond of the desired time for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un elemento <see langword="int" /> que contiene un valor en milisegundos del tiempo deseado para presentar un <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns instructions on how to emphasize a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve instrucciones sobre cómo resaltar un <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see langword="int" /> value indicating how to emphasize a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor <see langword="int" /> que indica cómo resaltar un <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The interpretation of the value returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> depends on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the current <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>.
trans-unit.target: La interpretación del valor devuelto por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> depende de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valor devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propiedad actual <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>.

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>
trans-unit.target: Si el valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> es <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> is positive, the value returned should be interpreted as the length of the silence in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> es positivo, el valor devuelto debe interpretarse como la longitud de la latencia en milisegundos.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> is negative, the value returned should be interpreted as a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> es negativo, el valor devuelto debe interpretarse como un miembro de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>.

trans-unit.source: Emphasis information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> when the property <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence> corresponds to the attributes of the `<break>` element of SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: Información de énfasis devuelta por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> cuando la propiedad <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> es <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence> corresponde a los atributos de la `<break>` elemento de entrada SSML a un motor de sintetizador de voz.

trans-unit.source: For all other values of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> values should be interpreted as being of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.
trans-unit.target: Para todos los demás valores de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> valores deben interpretarse como perteneciente al <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>.

trans-unit.source: Emphasis information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> for spoken words corresponds to the attributes of the `<emphasis>` element of SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: Información de énfasis devuelta por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A> oral corresponde a los atributos de la `<emphasis>` elemento de entrada SSML a un motor de sintetizador de voz.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state as another <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> instance, or an [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) which can be cast to <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina si la instancia actual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describe el mismo estado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> que otra instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> o un [Objeto](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) que se puede convertir a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be cast to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
trans-unit.target: Objeto que se puede convertir en una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines if a given object is an instance <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina si un objeto dado es una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> igual a la instancia actual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" />, if the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and that obtained from the [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) provided by the <paramref name="obj" /> argument describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see langword="true" />, si la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> actual y la obtenida de [Objecto](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) proporcionado por el argumento <paramref name="obj" /> describen el mismo estado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="false" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and the <paramref name="obj" /> argument do not support the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see langword="false" /> si el <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> actual y el argumento <paramref name="obj" /> no admiten el mismo estado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The method return false if the [Object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) provided by the `obj` argument cannot be cast to <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: La false si devuelto método la [objeto](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/vstudio/system.object\(v=vs.110\).aspx) proporcionada por el `obj` argumento no se puede convertir a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> that
trans-unit.target: Una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> que

trans-unit.source: Determines if a given instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> is equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina si una instancia determinada de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> es igual a la instancia actual de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" />, if both the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and that supplied through the <paramref name="other" /> argument describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see langword="true" />, si tanto la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> actual como la proporcionada a través del argumento <paramref name="other" /> describen el mismo estado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="false" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> and the <paramref name="other" /> argument do not support the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see langword="false" /> si el <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> actual y el argumento <paramref name="other" /> no admiten el mismo estado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el código hash de esta instancia.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Entero de 32 bits con signo, que es el código hash de esta instancia.

trans-unit.source: Returns the language supported by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el lenguaje admitido por el <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see langword="int" /> containing an identifier for the language used by the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un elemento <see langword="int" /> que contiene un identificador para el lenguaje usado por el <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A> are those used with the Windows Speech API (SAPI) and are generated from the "`xml:lang`" attribute on SSML input to a speech synthesizer engine.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A> son los que se usan con Windows Speech API (SAPI) y se generan a partir del "`xml:lang`" atributo en la entrada SSML a un motor de sintetizador de voz.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state2</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> cuyo estado descrito se compara con la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> proporcionada por el argumento <c>state2</c>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state1</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> cuyo estado descrito se compara con la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> proporcionada por el argumento <c>state1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Determina si dos instancias de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describen el mismo estado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> and <paramref name="state2" />, describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state, otherwise <see langword="false" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see langword="true" /> si ambas instancias de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> y <paramref name="state2" /> describen el mismo estado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />; en caso contrario, devuelve <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: El método equivalente para este operador es <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state2</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> cuyo estado descrito se compara con la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> proporcionada por el argumento <c>state2</c>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> whose described state is compared against the instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> provided by the <c>state1</c> argument.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> cuyo estado descrito se compara con la instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> proporcionada por el argumento <c>state1</c>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describes the different <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state.
trans-unit.target: Determina si dos instancias de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" /> describen un estado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> diferente.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> and <paramref name="state2" />, do not describe the same <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> state, otherwise <see langword="false" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see langword="true" /> si ambas instancias de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState" />, <paramref name="state1" /> y <paramref name="state2" /> no describen el mismo estado de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />; en caso contrario, devuelve <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: El método equivalente para este operador es <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Equals%28System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Returns phonetic information for a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />
trans-unit.target: Devuelve información fonética para un <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: The information returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> property corresponds to the `<phoneme>` XML tag of SSML input to a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: La información devuelta por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> propiedad se corresponde con la `<phoneme>` etiqueta XML de entrada SSML a un motor de síntesis.

trans-unit.source: The array of `char` objects returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> property expresses pronunciation using the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).
trans-unit.target: La matriz de `char` objetos devueltos por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> propiedad expresa pronunciación usando el alfabeto fonético internacional (IPA).

trans-unit.source: Returns detailed information about the pitch, speaking rate, and volume of speech output.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve información detallada sobre el timbre, la velocidad de habla y el volumen de salida de la voz.

trans-unit.source: Returns a valid instance of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> containing the pitch, speaking rate, and volume settings, and changes to those setting, for speech output.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody" /> válida que contiene la configuración de timbre, velocidad de habla y volumen, y cambia a dicha configuración para la salida de voz.

trans-unit.source: The information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> corresponds to the `<prosody>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: La información devuelta por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody> corresponde a la `<prosody>` etiqueta XML de la especificación de SSML.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the context for the generation of speech from text..
trans-unit.target: Devuelve información sobre el contexto para la generación de voz a partir del texto.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> instance if the SSML used by a speech synthesis engine contains detailed information about the context to be used to generate speech, otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una instancia de valor <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs" /> si el SSML usado por un motor de síntesis de voz contiene información detallada sobre el contexto que se va a usar para generar voz; en caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The information returned by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A> corresponds to the `<say-as>` tag and its attributes in the SSML specification, and can specify:
trans-unit.target: La información devuelta por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A> corresponde a la `<say-as>` etiqueta y sus atributos en la especificación de SSML y puede especifican:

trans-unit.source: The content type (such as currency, date, or address) or language construct represented by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de contenido (por ejemplo, moneda, fecha o dirección) o la construcción de lenguaje representado por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: Optional formatting information to handle the content type represented by <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, for example, a date syntax.
trans-unit.target: Información de formato opcional para controlar el tipo de contenido representado por <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, por ejemplo, la sintaxis de una fecha.

trans-unit.source: The detail to be used in generating speech from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, for example, whether to explicitly render punctuation.
trans-unit.target: El detalle que se utilizará para generar la voz de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> propiedad de un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, por ejemplo, si se debe representar explícitamente los signos de puntuación.
